commands.name: az iot central app create
commands.syntax:
az iot central app create --name
                          --resource-group
                          --subdomain
                          [--display-name]
                          [--location]
                          [--mi-system-assigned]
                          [--no-wait]
                          [--sku {ST0, ST1, ST2}]
                          [--template]
examples: az iot central app create -n my-first-iot-app -g MyResourceGroup -s my-iot-app
az iot central app create -n my-first-iot-app -g MyResourceGroup -s my-iot-app -l eastus -p ST1 -t iotc-distribution
az iot central app create -n my-first-iot-app -g MyResourceGroup -s my-iot-app --mi-system-assigned

commands.name: az iot central app delete
examples: az iot central app delete -n my-first-iot-app -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az iot central app list
examples: az iot central app list -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az iot central app show
commands.summary: Get the details of an IoT Central application.
examples: az iot central app show -n my-first-iot-app
az iot central app show -n my-first-iot-app -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az iot central app update
commands.summary: Update metadata for an IoT Central application.
examples: az iot central app update -n my-first-iot-app -g MyResourceGroup --set sku.name=ST1
az iot central app update -n my-first-iot-app -g MyResourceGroup --set subdomain.name=my-iot-app-new
